<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"获取企业某个Issue所有评论"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v5/enterprises/{enterprise}/issues/{number}/labels"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>





<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"enterprise","in":"path","description":"仓库所属空间地址(企业、组织或个人的地址path)","required":true,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"number","in":"path","description":"Issue 编号, 全局唯一","required":true,"example":0,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}},{"name":"page","in":"query","description":"当前的页码, 默认 1","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","default":1}},{"name":"per_page","in":"query","description":"每页的数量, 默认20, 最大为 100","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","default":100}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"color":{"type":"string"},"name":{"type":"string"},"repositoryId":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"url":{"type":"string"},"createdAt":{"type":"string"},"updatedAt":{"type":"string"}},"title":"EnterpriseIssueDTO"}}}},"headers":{}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
